A Valve conseguiu se superar ao fazer este jogo, Portal 2 é uma obra de arte rara, não se vê muitos jogos que possuem uma história envolvente, multiplayer divertido e mecânica desafiadora. Com certeza superou o primeiro, se tornando um dos meus jogos favoritos. 

O modo online e o co-op são extremamente desafiadores, eles não são como outros jogos que subestimam o jogador, muito pelo contrário, Portal 2 te empurra até seus limites engenhosos para passar nas camaras de teste.

A história dos personagens também foi muito bem aprofundada, o que cria no jogardor mais empatia por tudo o que acontece no jogo

Excelente jogo, imperdível.
Its pretty damn fun!

The developers leave their console to you to mess around and you can play co-op.  I do wish they left futball in but still co-op is very fun. If you can afford it get this game.

This game is amazing game. One of the best valve games out there. This game personally blew my mind when I first played it. Going into this game blind is 100% recommended. This game is without a doubt one of my top 10 favorite games of all time.
This game is great for hours of fun because of the many community maps!

I would consider this game to be very close to perfect. The story is very engrossing, has lots of humor and depth, and the execution of the game itself is challenging and doesn't get stale. This game would be a 9.9 out of 10 even if it didn't have multiplayer, which adds further depth and meaning to the story, as well as the added fun of being able to experience with a friend. 

The only problem with this game is that there isn't enough of it, and this problem is perfectly solved with the Perpetual Testing Initiative. Unlimited maps, ranked to be the best, for your enjoyment. It just doesn't get much better than this for puzzle/story games.

"When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!"

모두가 추천하는 이유가 있는 게임

Just take a quick look at the overall rating. Not only is it 98%, but that makes it one of the highest rated games on Steam, above Half Life 2 and many others. If you don't like puzzle games, you might still enjoy Portal 2. The humor makes you want to keep playing. Also, this game is like Easter in terms of easter eggs. There's so many that it's kind of scary. There are even easter eggs inside of easter eggs. If you haven't played the first Portal, I recommend that you play that first. Also, if you have, and didn't enjoy it, you might want to wait for a sale to buy this game if you plan on buying it. 
    Portal 2 is well written, and features the voice talent of J.K. Simmons (Peter Parker's boss, and now Comissioner Gordon!) as Cave Johnson. The addition of gels was a great idea, because it adds more variety to the gameplay. Also, Custom Levels are extremely easy to make, and are fun to play. Co-op levels really do require full cooperation and a headset. It's nearly impossible to communicate without one. 
   With all this being said, Portal 2 is a great puzzle game. This may surprise you, but if you dig deep into the lore of this game and pay really close attention to every detail, Portal 2 is a really creepy game. I don't want to spoil it for anyone, so I'll just say that it's all very subtle and ambiguous. If you do plan on getting into the lore of Aperture Science, I recommend you read the comic (I forgot the name) and watch a lot of YouTube videos. 
   In conclusion, Portal 2 is one of the greatest modern games, no, one of the greatest games ever, and can be enjoyed by a wide variety of people. I hope that if you buy Portal 2 you enjoy it as much as I did. (I played and beat it on Xbox 360 and here on Steam) 





P.S. If you're interested in the darker side of Portal 2, there are quite a few videos discussing it, but here are the two best ones:

RustyMolboxer- Darker Side of the Disc

TheStickyPaddle-Creepy Gaming

Obviously, this game is fantastic. There is no other option. The 2% of people who said it was bad just don't appreciate good humor and/or games

Es más largo que el 1, con una historia más elaborada, y las pruebas introducen nuevas mecánicas que harán que te quiebres mucho más la cabeza que en la anterior entrega.

Se podría decir que es un juego mucho más completo que el 1; incluso tiene una historia cooperativa (que todavía tengo que probar), pero la esencia y el cachondeo del primer Portal - además de que era el primer contacto con la saga - son la parte principal del cariño que le he cogido a esta saga. A la espera estoy del 3, pero el final (grandioso, por cierto) queda un poco cerrado en mi opinión.

En resumen, juégalo, vale mucho la pena y te lo pasas en un finde.
Превосходная говоломка. Я бы даже сказал лучшая из лучших.
Świetna gra, która wymaga myślenia :)

Just play the damn game. Christ sake. Just... There is a reason why its played so much. The story is amazing, it has great pacing for a puzzle game.. or any game for a matter of fact. The puzzles get more difficult as you go along, but once you get it its satisfying. The voice acting is on point. Its not TO long. The fist time ive beat it I think it took me about 6ish hours. But it doesnt feel long, its an enjoyable game and the modding adds endless hours. As well as the multiplayer game. The community for multiplayer [You can choose to get matched with a random player if you dont know anyone who has the game] from my experience isnt that bad. I havnt had trolls or annoyances, of course youll have the occasional *missclick* dropping you into a lake of water. But every game ever has had that.

Overall score is 9.5/10 
(MAKE A THIRD AND YOU GET THE .5 VALVE.)
